content: on a recent cruise up the coast of new england and the canadian maritime provinces i was struck by the abundance of beautiful handmade mittens and hats for sale upon returning home i wanted to knit some traditional mittens for myself and found robin hansen s incredible checkerboard mittens in her book favorite mittens i was very pleased with these mittens and decided to make a hat to match and this pattern is the happy result december 15 2024 i have now updated the pattern to include two sizes small/medium and large/xl length can be easily added to either but because of how the top decreases work i do not recommend attempting to resize the width many thanks to marianne ho for translating the pattern for the small size into danish https //strikkeglad dk/54252/skakmoensterhue/ ----------- all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free it is intended for individual home use only and not to be reproduced or reknit for profit
